name: OKABU
description:
"Every element is an artful delight" - Eurogamer

"Blown away by the innovative puzzle action and vibrant visuals" - Digital Spy

Dive into a tactile toy-box world filled with puzzles, adventures, adorable creatures and destructive machines.

Take to the skies and guide cloud-whale brothers Kumulo and Nimbe on their epic adventure. Save the once-peaceful lands of Okabu from the diabolical Doza and their army of industrial contraptions.

Team up with the cloud-riding heroes - Captain Monkfish, Picolo, Kat and Roki. Harness their amazing skills to overcome the challenges that await.

• Multiplayer Co-op: Team up with a friend and embark on an epic Co-op campaign spread across four unique action-packed worlds
• Innovative Gameplay: Wield the skills of heroic Cloud-riders to manipulate the world around you, from rampaging bulls and exploding fruit, to powerful Doza machinery
• Mini-games: Dive into four addictive mini-games and challenge your friends to beat your best scores online
